titles.title: To authorize the honorary promotion to corporal of Private First Class Delbert Littrell, United States Marine Corps.
To authorize the honorary promotion to corporal of Private First Class Delbert Littrell, United States Marine Corps.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the President to issue an honorary promotion promoting Private First Class Delbert Littrell, U.S. Marine Corps (retired), to the rank of corporal.
